Class UtilityMovement

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object

      • move

        public static java.util.Optional<Position> move(Position position,
                                                Bounds bounds,
                                                Actions action,
                                                int speed)
        This method try to move the entity based on the param and the if is right return it, otherwise can fix it.
        Parameters:
        position - : actual position of entity.
        bounds - : the limits of the entity.
        action - : the action that the entity have to do.
        speed - : the speed of the entity.
        Returns:
        : the new position of the entity.
